title: Polar Vantage M2 & Ignite 2 update more affordable multisport GPS smart watches
content:
Polar revamp two of their popular multi-sport, GPS-tracking smart watches – the Vantage M2 & Ignite 2. The two pack in much of the key training capabilities and built-in heart rate tracking of Polar’s top-tier smartwatch, but at a fraction of the price.
